urbit@urbit.org

tisbar

=|, tisbar, [%tsbr p=tile q=twig] is a synthetic hoon that pushes ~(bunt al p) on the subject and sends it to q.

Definition

++  twig  
  $%  [%tsbr p=tile q=twig]
  ==

Regular form (tall)

=|  p
q

Regular form (wide)

=|(p q)

Expansion

++  open
  ^-  twig
  ?-  gen
    [%tsbr *]  [%tsls ~(bunt al p.gen) q.gen]
  ==

Notes

=|(p q) is the same as =+(_p q).
